name: gd-experiments
description: Gradient Descent Visualization with split frontend/backend architecture

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build:docker && npm run push:docker && npm run deploy:image
scripts.deploy:backend:slow: gcloud config set account patrickbrownai@gmail.com && gcloud config set project gd-visualizer && gcloud run deploy gd-experiments --source . --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --memory 512Mi --cpu 1 --timeout 300 --max-instances 1 --min-instances 0 --concurrency 80
scripts.deploy:image: gcloud config set account patrickbrownai@gmail.com && gcloud config set project gd-visualizer && gcloud run deploy gd-experiments --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/gd-visualizer/cloud-run-source-deploy/gd-experiments:latest --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --memory 512Mi --cpu 1 --timeout 300 --max-instances 1 --min-instances 0 --concurrency 80
scripts.dev:local: npm run dev:local:backend & npm run dev:local:frontend
scripts.logs:backend: gcloud run services logs read gd-experiments --region us-central1 --limit 50
scripts.status: npm run status:backend && npm run status:frontend
scripts.status:backend: gcloud run services describe gd-experiments --region us-central1 --format='value(status.url,spec.template.metadata.annotations.autoscaling\.knative\.dev/maxScale)'
